song_name: Please Don't Shoot the Trombone Players
metrics_conclusion: Please Don't Shoot the Trombone Players has higher complexity than the average song  in terms Melodic Complexity and Chord-Bass Melody.
key_conclusion: Please Don't Shoot the Trombone Players has sections analyzed in the following keys: F Major,  and G Major.  Click on the linked cheat sheets for popular chords, chord progressions, downloadable midi files and more!
